channel.title: Pages on Pinpoint Consultancy
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Pinpoint Consultancy

item.title: History
item.description: About Heading The business was founded by Charlie Arua Ikosi, a geospatial graduate from the University of Canterbury and an alumni of the Manaaki New Zealand Scholarship 2020-2022 for pacific scholars. The establishment of the business was to address a skills and technical gap in the country that under utilized GIS in decision making for development related planning and for disaster mitigation and response.
